WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I have created RibbonComboBox and ItemsSource is binded to ObservableCollection. Everything works, but when the window size is decreased and RibbonGroup is collapsed, then ItemsSource of RibbonGalleryCatogory is null and Combo is empty.
I have tried it on the last version (October) and the previous too.
See attached project.
Best regards Lukas
WorkItem.Summary: RibbonComboBox lost ItemsSource after Group is collapsed

Comments.Message: It looks, that all developers died...
if you use an ObservableCollection wrap it with a CompositeCollection, within our application it works
